website_summaries.verdict: Minus the sizing concern, these golf shoes offer unbeatable style and performance, and are extremely comfortable – all the features that help golfers keep their focus.
pros: Good looks, superior, lightweight comfort, and top-of-the-line performance by a popular name in athletic shoes
waterproof with a 1-year guarantee to back the feature
cons: Sizes tend to run quite large, as a few men have reported having to go up an entire size larger than they normally wear

customer_reviews.title: they were very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like them so far, have walked one round in them, and they were very comfortable. It was an early round and the grass was very wet, no problems with the waterproofing. Personally, I like the gray/green, it's a nice option to get away from white or black shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe esp for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes exceeded my expectations. They fit fine but I always worry about the break-in and the associated discomfort that can bring while walking 18. Not with these shoes. I played all day in these walking 18 on their first outing with no prior break-in and they were good. I also played on a really wet day the next day and they were great! For the $ these are a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: The shoe sound like a rubber boot, but look great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. The only thing is the make a noise when you walk. They are water proof, but they kinda sound like a rubber boot. They are worth $99 I'm glad I didn't pay the original price of $135. Over all I'm OK with them. Maybe the noise will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light weight. Gives you a touch more stability than spineless shoes (I have both). Have not played in the rain yet so no comment on how waterproof they are. They do need a round or two to break in.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could wear these off the golf course. These shoes are so comfortable. They just might be the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for being Nike brand
customer_reviews.text: My man liked them and wears them everytime out golfing.
customer_reviews.author: ♧£¡rpa Harp€r♧

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit to size
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit to size. I usually replace the factory insoles with custom made ones but these seem to be really glued in. I will try these before tearing them out as they seem ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worst golf shoe I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Both soles came detached from the shoe in less than 20 rounds. They're not waterproof by any stretch. By far, the worst golf shoe I've ever worn. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: These are the best golf shoes I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Jstrunk

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m buying another pair different color very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a little snug at first but loosened up as I wore them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected.. took about 2 rounds to break in nicely. overall very comfortable and great traction.
customer_reviews.author: William O.

customer_reviews.title: White string loops not stripes by the eyelets.
customer_reviews.text: What looks like white decorative stripes around the eyelets are actually string to assist in tightening the shoe. One shoe of the pair I had had one sting loop to short. It didn't match the other shoe. Returned the pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rica Kuniyoshi

customer_reviews.title: Sound like rubber boots
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping they would be as comfortable as everyone said, but they were not and they also sound like I am wearing rubber rain boots....I wish I bought a different style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf shoe, just too big.
customer_reviews.text: We returned do to the fact they were too big.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeLady

customer_reviews.title: Premium Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: These suckers are great. Most comfortable golf shoe I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: jared montoya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived speedy and look great. Friends are very jealous! Amazingly comfortable and great grip. Can’t wait to play in them again. Includes a waterproof warranty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Great lookimg shoe! Have not golfed in them yet. The fit was a little bigger than expected. I wear a 9 could have went 8 1/2
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: love the shoes. very happy with the design and comfort. just a hair to big but I do love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He says they are very comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He wears every day for practice and loves them. He says they are very comfortable and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great traction and feel but pool quality. The tongue ripped right off after about a month
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, it’s absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great look, great traction, and awesome fit. Not disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: but shoe provides great traction and is comfortable to walk in right out ...
customer_reviews.text: Toe Cap is a bit wide, but shoe provides great traction and is comfortable to walk in right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: sethanan chutichetpong

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are just OK I’m my opinion. Not worth $135
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nike Golf- Lunar Command 2 Shoes -13
product_meta.description: Featuring fly wire technology and lunar lon foam, the men's NIKE lunar command 2 golf shoe provides lightweight cushioning and a locked-down fit. It features a technical TPU midfoot shank for enhanced ground feel on a variety of surfaces
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Flywire technology integrates with the laces for a dynamic, supportive fit
Lunarlon cushioning for a responsive heel to toe transition
Waterproof membrane in the upper helps keep your feet dry
Lunarlon cushioning for a responsive heel to toe transition
7 removable CHAMP PiviX golf spikes twist and lock into a CHAMP SLIM-Lok system for exceptional traction and enhanced ground feel on a variety of surfaces
